name: DeadHall Dinner
description:
DeadHall Dinner is Survival Shooter game developed by Nik Amir Syafiq bin Abdul Aziz under Team Nixxell Studio.

The Game take event in MJSC Muar, Johor, Malaysia in which an infection spread cause by an unknown plague spread trough out Muar. Its believe that the virus start from  students who have their dinner at Dinner Hall.
Mon(Player), Coco, Kechill and Nix were the last hope to cure the rogue Muo.

The game is in early access so maybe there will be few glitches and bugs. Leave a comment and report us any bugs.

                                                                                                                                                                                   

Updated!

  • intro and credit fixed
  • save game problem fixed
  • few bugs solved

Coming soon!

  • LAN Multiplayer mode

  • Brother LemPem Return's Story

Thanks for supporting .
